name: Multiplayer Manic Miner
description:
This is a  recreation of the Central Cavern level of Manic Miner, except it allows up to 4 players to play simultaneously on the same PC.

It's a race to be the first to collect all the keys and then get back to the flashing waffle-type thing, using either gamepads or the keyboard.

It's a fun party game! 

UPDATES:

* 1.2 - Improved the dropping platforms, and slowed Willy down.
